short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your Polkadot accounts outside of dapps. Injects the accounts and allows signing transactions for a specific account.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anon ID: Your Key to Total Data Ownership and Security.
Generate, securely store, and control all your digital assets with Anon ID’s decentralized facial recognition technology—where you are always in control.

Developed to give users complete ownership of their data, Anon ID offers a powerful yet simple way to manage not just passwords, but all types of sensitive information—backed by cutting-edge privacy features. Create and store strong passwords, manage credentials, and access all your important data securely. But that’s just the start—Anon ID goes beyond typical password management. With Anon ID, you can store, create, and delete your data at any time, all while maintaining complete control. Use the extension as an SSO! Request a business to integrate Anon ID and earn real money! Share in our growth!

Anon ID doesn’t just give you access—it gives you ownership.

Here’s what you get when you choose Anon ID:

➡️ Decentralized Storage
Go beyond traditional storage. With Anon ID, your data is stored on a secure, decentralized network, ensuring only you have control.

➡️ Full Data Ownership
Create, store, or delete your passwords, credentials, or any other sensitive data whenever you choose. You control every aspect of your data.

➡️ Autofill and Autosave
Quickly log in to websites without manually entering your credentials, and seamlessly autosave new passwords as you go.

➡️ Store Personal Information
Store credit cards, personal notes, passkeys, and more with Anon ID’s secure storage.

➡️ Cross-Device Sync
Save a password on your laptop and access it instantly on your mobile device or desktop. Your data is available wherever you need it.

➡️ Unlimited Data Storage
Store unlimited passwords, notes, credentials, and more. You have full control of your data, even offline.

➡️ Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
Strengthen your security with multi-factor authentication, biometric access, and advanced OTP generators.

➡️ Emergency Access and Secure Sharing
Safely share access with trusted individuals and provide emergency access to your most important data.

➡️ Secure File Storage
Attach, store, and retrieve files securely, with 3TB of decentralized storage.

➡️ Password Import and Export
Easily transition from other password managers to Anon ID without losing any data.

➡️ Advanced Encryption
All your data is encrypted with the highest standards of security, ensuring your information stays safe.

➡️ Zero-Knowledge Protocol
With our zero-knowledge architecture, not even Anon ID can access your data—only you have the keys.

Take full control of your digital identity with Anon ID.
Download today and experience total data ownership—no compromises, no middlemen, just you and your data.

For more information, visit: AnonID.io
For Privacy Policy, visit: Privacy Policy
Questions? Contact our support team: support@anonid.io
